thread.title: Wot I Think: Mass Effect Andromeda
thread.title_full: Wot I Think: Mass Effect Andromeda

author: John Walker
title: Wot I Think: Mass Effect Andromeda
text: Strap in. Mass Effect Andromeda [ official site ] is out on Tuesday in the US, and then because EA still lives in 1987, in Europe on Thursday. I’ve played it for over 70 hours, seen the main ending, and am entirely ready to tell you wot I think. It’s well worth reading my previous piece on the first few hours , as there’s much there that’s relevant that I’ve not repeated below. … [ visit site to read more ]
